concept.title: Sample YAML project files
concept.shortdesc: DITA-OT includes sample project files in format that can be used to define a publication project. Like the XML project samples, the sample YAML files illustrate how deliverables can be described for use in publication projects. The YAML samples are functionally equivalent to their XML and JSON counterparts, with minor adaptations to YAML file syntax.

conbody.p: Project files can be designed in a modular fashion to create reusable configuration structures that allow you to define settings in one file and refer to them in other projects to publish multiple deliverables at once.
For example, /project-files/html.yaml defines a single HTML deliverable.
